param.name: CONDITION
param.dialogReference:
Condition

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] intersect

[1] are completely within

[2] completely contain

[3] have their centroid in

[4] contain the centeroid of

Default: 0

Select shapes that fulfil this condition

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Method

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] new selection

[1] add to current selection

[2] select from current selection

[3] remove from current selection

Default: 0
